text_block_list.text:
During lunch break, I was walking in the school hallways when I 
spotted a familiar face in one of the classrooms.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: The 7 of hearts, if I remember was to the right of this…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah, Trainer-san. I'm playing Memory.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
So far, I've been doing well and if this keeps 
up I'll get all the cards… huh…?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Aaaah! I forgot where everything was…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …No, don't worry. I'll just have to start over.

Saying that, Silence Suzuka quietly 
rearranged the cards by herself.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Alright. This time, for sure.
choice_data_list: By any chance, are you playing by yourself?
By any chance, are you playing by yourself?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Eh? Yeah, that's right… It's fun, 
you know? Playing Memory solo.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
I limit the number of times I can fail so 
it has just the right amount of tension.

Imposing her own rules and stoicly playing, 
is very Silence Suzuka-like.
But, since there's two of us…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: A match… is it? That's… um…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah… sorry. I was… just a little confused…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Um, understood. For now… let's give 
it a shot. Please go easy on me.

And that's how I started a game of 
Memory with Silence Suzuka. But-

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah… it wasn't here. Okay, it's your turn, Trainer-san.

Only a few cards remained. Using my memory, 
one by one, I flipped them.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah…!?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Eh… there too…?! No…! Aaah, even that one…?!

Out of the corner of my eye, I watched Silence Suzuka's every 
reaction as I flipped card after card in one go.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Aaah… one after another, the cards I wanted…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Deducing the cards at the end of the game and taking them all in 
one go is the most satisfying part though…
choice_data_list: Is that why you were playing alone?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Yes.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Ah, please don't worry. I was the one that accepted 
Trainer-san's invitation, after all.
Oops. Looks like I've ruined her fun…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Is something the matter, Trainer-san? 
I'm going to set them up again.
choice_data_list: Ah, you're still going to play with me?
Ah, you're still going to play with me?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yeah…Next time I'll win.

After that, we continued playing Memory until Silence 
Suzuka was satisfied with her victories.
